main event: Three unidentified flying objects were observed in Lacomb, Oregon on December 20, 1955, for approximately 15 minutes.
interesting points: The objects were described as round or oval, about the size of a basketball,Glowed with amber colors reminiscent of coals in a fire,They seemed to move back and forth in formation but one was sometimes stationary while others moved at high speeds,No sound was reported from the objects,Weather conditions were bright and clear during the sighting.
sighted object: three round or oval glowing objects in the sky
witness description: observer was a Chevrolet dealer from Lebanon, Oregon
